com.jidesoft.swing
Class JideCursors

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jidesoft.swing.JideCursors
public class JideCursors
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class that create additional cursors used by JIDE products. Notes: this class has to be public so that JIDE can use it in different packages, not meant to release to end user as a public API. JIDE will not gurantee the class will remain as it is.
